# Drone News 48h Brief — February 03, 2026

_Window: last 48 hours; 53 incidents._

## Summary
Over the past 48 hours, multiple drone incidents have been reported globally, highlighting diverse challenges from illegal operations to smuggling and security breaches. In Poland, a series of crashes involving drones have raised security concerns, especially near military sites, prompting investigations. In India, legal actions against unauthorized drone use in film production continue to unfold. In the smuggling sphere, Ferozepur police dismantled a drug smuggling network linked to Pakistan, further illustrating cross-border issues. In the UK, there were increased reports of unauthorized drone sightings near military bases amid rising tensions with Russia. These incidents collectively underscore the need for robust regulations and heightened vigilance in both civilian and military drone operations.

**By category:** airport: 2 • arrest: 4 • crash: 11 • other: 27 • security: 4 • smuggling: 3 • terrorism: 2
**Top queries:** drone incident (12), unauthorized drone (10), drone arrest (7), drone terrorism (7), drone crash (6)
